subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Washington Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin, whose late-season funk stretched into Game 1 of the Eastern Conference quarterfinals, produced four points and a few taunts in Game 2.
snippet: The Washington Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin, whose late-season funk stretched into Game 1 of the Eastern Conference quarterfinals, produced four points and a few taunts in Game 2.
